Name: Propagations Per Generation
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the number of propagations per generation. By default this setting is 0, meaning that all propagations will be performed in the first generation. Otherwise, propagations will be split into the desired number of generations, allowing for storing temporary results and resuming at a later point.

Name: Max Propagations
Termination Criteria.Description: Indicates the maximum number of propagations to perform. By default this setting is 0, meaning that as many propagations as samples will be performed.

Name: Theta Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of variables in the samples to propagate.
